name: 凌凱
objective: 本課程使學生具有進階德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
schedule:
February 27: Lesson 9 - Chinese New Year, auxiliary verb "müssen"
March 6: Lesson 9 - Imperative, auxiliary verb "dürfen"
March 13: Lesson 9 - Reading brochures, at a hotel reception
March 20: Lesson 9 - Review, test
March 27: Lesson 10 - Photo story (health)
April 3: Lesson 10 - Human body, possessive pronouns
April 10: Lesson 10 - Auxiliary verb "sollen", reading adverts
April 17: Lesson 10 - Making appointments
April 24: Lesson 10 - Review, test
May 1: Lesson 11 - Photo story (in the city)
May 8: Lesson 11 - Asking for directions, prepositions
May 15: Lesson 11 - "Wo" and "wohin", announcements and time tables
May 22: Lesson 11 - At the train station
May 29: Lesson 11 - Review, test
June 5: Lesson 12 - Photo story (the customer is king)
June 19: Final exam
scorePolicy:
Class participation: 10%
Assignments: 20%
Quizzes: 10%
Midterm exam: 30%
Final exam: 30%
materials: As a textbook we use "Schritte International 2". It is a good choice for teaching German because of its systematic training of the four different skills: reading, listening, speaking, and writing. Included are a workbook (used for doing exercises at home) and three audio CDs.
